TargetFunctionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function associated with the Function URL.
TargetFunctionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function associated with the Function URL.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^(arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:lambda:)?([a-z]{2}((-gov)|(-iso(b?)))?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:)?(\d{12}:)?(function:)?([a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)(:((?!\d+)[0-9a-zA-Z_]+))?$  

Update requires: No interruption

Qualifier.description: The alias qualifier for the target function. If TargetFunctionArn is unqualified then Qualifier must be passed.
Qualifier.markdownDescription:
The alias qualifier for the target function. If TargetFunctionArn is unqualified then Qualifier must be passed.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: ((?!^[0-9]+$)([a-zA-Z0-9-_]+))  

Update requires: No interruption

AuthType.description: Can be either AWS_IAM if the requests are authorized via IAM, or NONE if no authorization is configured on the Function URL.
AuthType.markdownDescription:
Can be either AWS_IAM if the requests are authorized via IAM, or NONE if no authorization is configured on the Function URL.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

InvokeMode.description: The invocation mode for the function’s URL. Set to BUFFERED if you want to buffer responses before returning them to the client. Set to RESPONSE_STREAM if you want to stream responses, allowing faster time to first byte and larger response payload sizes. If not set, defaults to BUFFERED.
InvokeMode.markdownDescription:
The invocation mode for the function’s URL. Set to BUFFERED if you want to buffer responses before returning them to the client. Set to RESPONSE_STREAM if you want to stream responses, allowing faster time to first byte and larger response payload sizes. If not set, defaults to BUFFERED.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

FunctionArn.description: The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function associated with the Function URL.
FunctionArn.markdownDescription:
The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function associated with the Function URL.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^(arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:lambda:)?([a-z]{2}((-gov)|(-iso(b?)))?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:)?(\d{12}:)?(function:)?([a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)(:((?!\d+)[0-9a-zA-Z_]+))?$  

Update requires: No interruption

FunctionUrl.description: The generated url for this resource.
FunctionUrl.markdownDescription:
The generated url for this resource.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Cors.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

AllowCredentials.description: Specifies whether credentials are included in the CORS request.

AllowHeaders.description: Represents a collection of allowed headers.

AllowMethods.description: Represents a collection of allowed HTTP methods.

AllowOrigins.description: Represents a collection of allowed origins.

ExposeHeaders.description: Represents a collection of exposed headers.
